name: Real Badminton HD
description:
Play the fastest racquet sport in the world!
Real Badminton is the ultimate 3D badminton game on your iPad and iPad with Retina display!

You'll need lightning-quick reflexes, inch-
perfect netplays and devastating jump smashes to
challenge the world's top shuttlers. Come on, step
on court now!

Game features:
- 8 players from 8 different countries
- 5 different badminton courts
- Quick matches for that badminton quick fix
- Match configuration system
- Game Center achievements to test your mettle
- 5 World class tournaments
- 3 Challenge minigames
- Share your victory screens with friends on Facebook and Twitter
- Interactive tutorial system
- Retina screen support
- Realistic shuttlecock physics

Real Badminton - the REAL badminton game
on the App Store!

Visit http://real-badminton.com
